key_risks: Legal and regulatory risks, including antitrust lawsuits and class action settlements
Financial risks due to high debt load and dependency on repricing services
Reputational risks from pricing transparency and ethical concerns
controversies: Multiple lawsuits alleging price-fixing and antitrust violations
Provider allegations of underpaying out-of-network claims by 61-81%
social_issues: Ethical concerns over prioritizing insurer savings over fair reimbursement for providers
governance_issues: Potential vulnerabilities in legal and governance practices highlighted by class action settlement
